description:
Maple`s Mawile lives with Maple in the Must Mountains of the Kalos region. It can Mega Evolve during battles. It often watches the house when Maple goes out. It was targeted by Rocket Gang and briefly captured until it was rescued by Korrina`s Lucario.
Korrina`s Lucario battled against Maple`s Mawile in a Mega Evolution battle, and it lost the battle to Kucheat as it couldn`t control its Wave at the time.
name: Kucheat (Maple)
